html:
5.23.19  12:53 am   Lately my friend has been doing some stuff that I find really bad, and I really want to confront them about it, but I don't have the courage to do that. How should I handle this situation?

     do not confront them, until you have the courage

5.23.19  12:45 am   how do I know when to take a break

     i don't know

5.23.19  12:10 am   iIf you could choose to live on any planet in space, which one would it be and why?

     this one because it is not only the most interesting but also the only one i have ever heard of that it is physically possible for me to survive on

5.22.19  11:14 pm   why does your website look so weird and minimalistic?

     so it actually works

5.22.19  11:14 pm   do you have advice for aspiring musicians

     does that mean you are not yet a musician and you aspire to be, or does that mean you are already a musician and you are aspiring to be more? either way i would suggest go ahead and make the next step, so you can continue to aspire to the following step, and make that step also, soon after

5.22.19  11:13 pm   what's the scariest movie you've seen

     this one really badly produced ad that's been stalking me lately

5.22.19  11:00 pm   you inspire me to make songs and be creative, am i wasting my time idolizing  you?

     no

5.22.19  10:37 pm   what is your reasoning or motivation behind putting those synth lines that play continuous streams of kinda-arpeggiated notes in your songs? like i'm thinking of that cool facts song you just posted as a response to a question, or the 'coast guard' section of long journey. haven't heard it many other places, so i was wondering why you use that texture

     it's kind of like when you want to make a blanket but you don't actually have any cloth or fabric, so you try to make the blanket out of rocks. it can make a pretty good blanket if you approach it with a blanket enough attitude

5.22.19  10:33 pm   Do you think people focus so much on the more negative aspects of your lyrics that they miss the positive or encouraging parts?

     whatever they most enjoy, i suppose

5.22.19  10:24 pm   Thoughts on Bohemian Rhapsody song?

     despite its popularity i have never heard it on the radio and i don't know why

5.22.19  10:11 pm   do you get backlogged with questions on this page?

     sure

5.22.19  9:42 pm   my mon listened to you for the first time and she said that you had to be "on some drugs" when making your songs. What should I do/tell her?

     you could tell her my relatives think you're on drugs

5.22.19  9:17 pm   how are some songs so good ???

     could be that extra little bit of crack cocaine it is laced with

5.22.19  9:03 pm   Are you done with the vocals for your next video?

     yes

5.22.19  9:03 pm   "If you find yourself speaking with a person who does not make sense, in all likelihood, that person is not real.."

What do you think about that? 

     doesn't make sense

5.22.19  8:58 pm   Do you speak fluent gibberish?

     no

5.22.19  8:35 pm   what is the greatest lesson we can learn from Peter Gabriel?

     how to write songs and also make musical recordings of those songs

5.22.19  8:02 pm   have you ever tried to make songs that are usually out of your "comfort zone"?

     sure

5.22.19  6:31 pm   What are the animal at the zoo hiding from me damn it?!?!

     the full breadth of their affection

5.22.19  6:04 pm   are musical rivalries good,

     sure

5.22.19  5:56 pm   do you ever enjoy a cold one (beer) when working on a project?

     no

5.22.19  5:41 pm   Is it possible to ask if this is the shortest question ever asked while being true?

     no

5.22.19  4:37 pm   What did you do during the 90s?

     probably a lot of instrumental music

5.22.19  2:59 pm   is there any more songs coming soon?

     yes

5.22.19  2:54 pm   Instead of dreamsongs, when I fall asleep I see sketches, and I can't possibly recreate them but they're mine and they're beautiful. I can't share them though, because I can't remember details. What to do

     you'll have to try

5.22.19  1:14 pm   Do you like Fleetwood Mac?

     i'm not sure

5.22.19  11:51 am   When you write music, how much is it you intentionally trying to make something comedic

     maybe 4 to 9%

      and how much is it you just putting down whatever words you feel like?

     words and music together

5.22.19  11:44 am   why do i feel sad listening to your music 

     i don't know

5.22.19  10:39 am   Do you like fans or air conditioners?

     they each have advantages and disadvantages

5.22.19  3:56 am   Why don't you begin the answers to any of these questions with a capital letter?

     that's usually not the most effective placement for capital letters, i find. unless it happens to begin with something that needs capitalization for another reason

5.22.19  3:27 am   thoughts on Australia?

     it's kind of like a boat

5.22.19  12:14 am   Do you have a favorite meme at the moment,

     television

      or are they all just terrible?

     they are all good. 'meme' means good

5.21.19  10:47 pm   Have there been times you've regretted making the questions page

     no

5.21.19  10:45 pm   sometimes i end up trying to write music on sheet music when i don't have an instrument on hand, and I can kinda hear the music but when i end up hearing it for real a lot of times it surprises me how it actually sounds out loud. is this me needing to work on hearing music in my head/needing to work with an instrument instead, or just me getting hung up on it not sounding "conventional"?

     i'm not sure

5.21.19  10:30 pm   any rupert holmes moments you enjoy?

     i love the remake plies did of the pina collada song (she got it made), does that count

5.21.19  9:10 pm   do you always overwrite the same project file or do you save as a new file every time?

     just regular save but if i am doing something particularly risky i might duplicate the previous copy before saving

5.21.19  8:58 pm   5.19.19  9:27 pm do you know when that interview will come out?

     never

5.21.19  8:03 pm   I'm trying and I'm trying but I'm not getting any better at singing. what gives? is it just not in me?

     i'm not sure. what i would suggest at this point is to try a little bit less, even though that might not be what you want to do

5.21.19  7:53 pm   What is the third verse of star spangled flag

     the star spangled community at large

5.21.19  7:19 pm   What do you normally do immediately after releasing a vid?

     questions

5.21.19  6:47 pm   What's inside a black hole? 

     memes

5.21.19  6:07 pm   you have so much power. what do you do with it

     would be nice to figure out how to convert toxic waste into something a little more appetizing

5.21.19  5:21 pm   Are the colors changing in the other categories section of your website? I swear every time I go there I get the feeling that they are different. Am I going crazy?

     whenever a new section is added, the color scheme usually has to adjust slightly. the most recent change was may 13, 2018, when 'objects' was added. the previous change was on july 2, 2017 when "scramble" was added. the previous change was on may 17, 2016 when "improv" and "reality" were added. the previous change, i think, was july 15, 2015 when the otherother page was made in the first place

5.21.19  4:27 pm   Is This Music?

     no

5.21.19  4:27 pm   have your neighbors ever been so loud that it disrupted you from recording

     usually not recording but anything else

5.21.19  3:42 pm   Do you have to be a tomato to suffer from tomato anxiety?

     no, actually it was named after dr. tomato, who never suffered it but claims to have discovered it in patients

5.21.19  3:31 pm   after two years, i finally caught the lick in history of the entire world (14:15)
nicely played ;)

     i don't know which part that is but it was not intentional

5.21.19  3:15 pm   why don't you make a mad song

     that's a good idea

5.21.19  3:12 pm   Where did all of my creativity go

     into your creations

      and how can I get it back?

     you'll have to make more

5.21.19  3:00 pm   Just did a bad thing.

     ah, #relatable
